name: Cyber-Dash: Jam Version
description:
Dive in to cyberspace...

An endless runner with enemies in your way, blast them or jump! Fly high to avoid obstacles and destroy those above you!

Created for Mix and Game Jam 2020.

---

Controls:

  • Move Left and Right - Left and Right Arrow / A and D / Left Stick
  • Navigate Menus - Up and Down Arrows / W and S/ Left Stick
  • To Fly - On the ground, press up (Up Arrow / W / Left Stick)
  • Jump  - X or Left mouse button / Controller Button 1
  • Fire  - Z or Right mouse button / Controller Button 0
  • Pause - Esc / Controller Button 9
  • Submit - Space / Controller 0

Art and Programming by ZeroZXDev
Level design, music and sound effects by Killiancu

Word of Warning as of the initial release version: 

Due to time circumstances the game launches in 1080p full screen, we will put out an update to fix this and other bugs in the future.
